text: 只差那么一点，每次都差那么一点。 高潮控制让他想要得快发疯了，阴道内部饥渴难耐，子宫尖叫着受孕，而克拉克抵住他后腰的肉棒更是加重了这渴望。 他主动张开双腿好叫那女阴更好地贴上手掌，更是在克拉克揉弄时主动摇晃下身，将淫液全部涂抹在手掌上。 克拉克冰凉的手已经被泡得温热，好几次，他用指甲轻轻刮蹭过阴蒂，又探入一个指节进到那穴里。 他逼出一小团水后又迅速撤离，独留那阴道抽搐着，痉挛着，只差那么一点点就抵达高潮。
trans: It was so close, every single time. The climax control made him almost go crazy with desire. The inside of the vagina was sex-starved, the uterus was screaming for conception, and the meat stick that Clark was pressing against his lower back intensified this longing even more. He voluntarily spread his legs wider to allow the cysthus to better adhere to his palm, and she even actively swayed her lower body when Clark was rubbing, smearing all the sexual fluid onto his palm. Clark’s previously cold hand had been soaked warm by now. for several times, he gently scraped the clitoris with his nails and even inserted a knuckle into the vagina. He forced out a small amount of fluid and then quickly withdraw, leaving the vagina twitching and convulsing, so close to reaching the climax.
